hopobject.name: Omek Beckon SDK
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.52 Safari/536.5
hopobject.body: Omek Beckon™ Development Suite is a full-featured set of middleware and tools that enables the creation of full body tracking and gesture interfaces, working with input from a wide range of 3D (depth) sensors, including sensors from Microsoft, PrimeSense, Panasonic and ASUS. Beckon is ideal for applications and interfaces that run on game consoles, televisions and TV peripherals, digital signage platforms, medical devices, or any other system where the user’s full body is visible by the camera.
hopobject.shortdesc: The Omek Beckon™ Development Suite is a full-featured set of middleware and tools that enables you to quickly and efficiently deploy gesture recognition and full body tracking in your applications.
